title: Who we are
snippet: Each shareholder is represented on the Board of Governors, which has overall authority over the Bank. Our President is Odile Renaud-Basso (left). The President manages our work under the guidance of the Board of Directors.

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: ... The Board of Directors is responsible for our country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations. The Executive Committee oversees all key aspects of the strategy, performance and financial soundness of the Bank. Our senior leadership group covers every aspect of the EBRD's business and advises the Executive Committee and President...
